title: Standoff!

meta.alt_txt: learn the total sum of damage from attacks you haven't blocked yet
meta.double_alt_txt: learn the exact damage of every attack you haven't blocked yet
meta.ext_txt: Doesn't provide info for attacks played after this. Doesn't inform user of any secondary effects.

desc:
Block 1 attack and learn the total sum of damage from attacks you haven't blocked yet.

If Doubled, instead learn the exact damage of every attack you haven't blocked yet.

~# Doesn't provide info for attacks played after this. Doesn't inform user of any secondary effects.
